Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone a in late January. It has fallen apart in 3 different places already. If you notice the clock in the pictured phone, it's different than the one they sold me. The box was a generic v8 box of sorts. The 'Gold' pieces are falling off of this phone and I've handled it with great care. This leads my wife and myself to believe that this is not an authentic Motorola Luxury phone. THEN, I told MASTER CELL STORE AND THEY THREATENED TO SUE ME!!! They will not give me any information regarding Master Cell Store or even give me a single name of who I was emailing. ALL OF THIS LEADS ME TO BELIEVE I WAS RIPPED OFF AND THAT I ALSO BOUGHT A KNOCK OFF PHONE. I WILL BE PURSUING A CLAIM HERE. THIS IS REALLY BAD BUSINESS HERE. YOU'VE BEEN WARNED!!!!! STAY AWAY FROM MASTER CELL STORE!!!!

Reviews.Title: Back cover falls off very often. Fragile cell phone
Reviews.Author: Riba
Reviews.Content: Unlike the other Motorola cell phones known as rugged, the V8 is fragile and the back cover falls off very often. The four attachment clips are small and weak.

Reviews.Title: Looks pretty, that's about it.
Reviews.Author: Benjamin A. Buttolph
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone after losing my D&G; V3. It looked terrific but operates horribly. Sold it on eBay a week or so later.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: once bitten
Reviews.Content: I am a dedicated V8 fan and already own a v8........I bought this phone and it stopped working after 2 weeks...I sent it for repair to Motorola UK, they informed me that the unit is a non-genuine MOTOROLA handset and refused to repair it....I complained got a refund and returned the phone....BUYERS BEWARE.....

Reviews.Title: not worth the $
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: i gave this a one star because the battery usage last a few hours at most, i do not recommend this phone to anyone

Reviews.Title: Motorola 2GB razr2 V8 gold
Reviews.Author: Rano
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item in March 2012 for someone abroad. I didn't check product upon delivery, thus didnt know that device delivered was of poor quality and monitor didnt work. Since I missed the deadline to return this item - I decided not to carry it back. I was impressed that the seller agreed to replace this device beyond the return deadlines if I get it back to them. Unfortunately my family already trashed it - since it was not possible to fix it. Thus, the seller was OK to deal with and willing to resolve this issue, however, overall I am not happy with my purchase and will not recommend it to my friends. It was lost of money.

Reviews.Title: All That Glitters Isn't Gold
Reviews.Author: The Standard
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone from the recommend sponsor letstalk1 and I had problems with it immediately on arrival. I was going to send it back after a long process getting the display setup because it wouldn't receive text messages. Called AT&T; a couple of days later and they helped to get the text message working, but then it wouldn't allow me to download pictures or music sent by text.  The gold circle icon on the back began to come out of place from just my pressing on it to put in my SIM card.  The speaker phone reception was spotty.  Letstalk1 gives you only 7 days to return it, and you need an RMA number from them to do so.  I requested one by email them and contact on their sight, but never got one.  A great looking phone, but the looks are deceiving.  Don't be fooled.

Reviews.Title: Pretty cell with bad battery
Reviews.Author: Eduardo S. Carvalho
Reviews.Content: The phone is not so good as I thought being more expensive and less friendly than my old V3. The battery is the worst part. I don't know whether it is normal if it stays on for only 24h in standby (when the ad promissed up to 330h) or the seller did send me an old and worn out one, which is more likely and a nasty thing to do to a customer.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy cell phones from resellers.
Reviews.Author: Gregory H. Evans
Reviews.Content: These phones are European and do not work well with U.S. systems. Many of the features do not function, and for the life of me I can't figure out why the sample photo's, screen saver, backgound include pictures of David Beckum and one of a BMW automobile, that you can not delete. I lost my phone and wanted to replace it without having to get one of the newer phones that are data based and would altimately cost me more money per month. The only reason I do not consider it a complete waste is that I can make a phone call. (that's about it, though) Cheese-and-crackers this is a rip-off if I ever saw one.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: alejandro hernandez
Reviews.Content: nice vintage more durable than my previous phones, they scratched relatively quicker than this one and the price was good i had trouble with asigning voicemail

Reviews.Author: Oxana
Reviews.Content: A huge thank you to YYPV and amazon.com for the prompt delivery of my phone!!!! The phone is excellent: the appearance, functionality - all satisfied! High-quality Assembly, all work, on the official website of the Motorola my product has registered, as authentic.

Reviews.Title: hit and miss
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: From my experience you have about a 50/50 chance of this being an actual Motorola razr or an extremely cheap knock off. i would also like to make sure that anyone thinking of buying this phone is aware that the analog clock on the front of the phone in the first picture isn't a physical clock, but rather a digital representation of an analog clock on the front screen. Buy at your own risk, you have a 50% chance of it becoming an expensive paperweight within the first week

Reviews.Title: This is chinese junk! Don't buy!
Reviews.Author: Timur Mirkamalov
Reviews.Content: The phone is not original motorola. maybe there is something by motorola inside, but from outside it looks like a cheap chinese junk. There is rubber instead of leather, the flip is loose when opened and closed, external screen doesn't work, charger is obviously secon hand, manual is from some other motorola.I suppose it's a Motorola, refurbished using the cheapest possible materials.

Reviews.Title: Not at what I expected
Reviews.Author: J. Tran "JT"
Reviews.Content: The flip is loosing, look like a refurbish or a defected phone. I have a V9 fro Verizon and is much better build

Reviews.Title: this is not a new one !
Reviews.Author: Eva David
Reviews.Content: I'm very dissapointed.I ordered it as a new but it didnot work so I took it in a Motorola service in Budapest.They opened it and recognised that this telephon has a brand new case but inside is very used , rusted one.They made photos about the inside panel,if you need I can send it.I paid for it not only its price but a duty and VAT ,either.I allways trusted in your products till now.I wonder your opinion,sincerelly , Eva David

Reviews.Title: Motorola 2G razr2 V8 gold luxury
Reviews.Author: Drotini
Reviews.Content: This phone has most everything I was looking for in a razr. It has a sharp appearance and has proved to be the replacement I was looking for. The volume for ringtones doesn't quite get to level I would like. Otherwise, I would have given it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: motorola razr2
Reviews.Author: Ruthie Okoomealingok
Reviews.Content: I HAD BEEN LOOKING FOR A MOTOROLA RAZR2 PHONE FOR A YEAR AND FOUND ONE AT AMAZON! I HAD ORDERED A 2GB BUT INSTEAD I RECEIVED A 3GB. BUT ANYWAY I STILL LOVE IT!  I CHOOSE THIS CELL PHONE BECAUSE IT IS SO EASY TO USE!

Reviews.Title: Run dont walk
Reviews.Author: ship4brains "Pep"
Reviews.Content: Even after reading other reviews, I was pulling for the under dog. Run do not walk while you still have a chance. You wil be bombarded with their staff calling and asking to change your reveiw. Not once was I asked why I wasnt satisfied. Screw the 160.00 I'll take it as a loss and feel lucky. AGAIN I SAY RUN DO NOT WALK.

Reviews.Title: EXELENTE,LUJOSO,GOLD
Reviews.Author: Luis Alfredo Paez
Reviews.Content: SALUDOS,EL CELULAR MOTOROLA 2GB RAZR2 V8,PERSONALMENTE SE LOS RECOMIENDO,SOBRE TODO SI A ALGUIEN DE ACA DE EL ECUADOR LE INTERESA COMPRAR UN CELULAR A TRAVES DE AMAZON.COM,RESULTO SER UN CELULAR LLENO DE OPCIONES PARA QUE TU PASES MUY PEGADO EN EL,FUNCIONA TODO ABSOLUTAMENTE TODO DEL CELU,UNA CAMARA NITIDA,UNA SEÑAL MUY CLARA,UN SONIDO ESPECTACULAR,ENTRE OTRAS,ADEMAS TIENES EN TUS MANOS UN CELU ELEGANTE,MANIOBRABLE Y SOBRE TODO MUY SERVICIAL,GRACIAS AMAZON POR EL CELULAR,NOS SEGUIREMOS VIENDO,BYE.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Vidarte
Reviews.Content: Todo muy bueno en tiempo y forma, el producto es muy bueno, la atencion tambien, todo 10 puntos, Gracias amazon

ProductInfo.Features:
New Motorola 2GB razr2 V8 gold Luxury QUAD band UNLOCKED GSM cellphone razr2 V8
Super-slim, iconic RAZR design with clamshell form factor, stainless steel frame, metal and glass housing, internal antenna
Large 2.0" QVGA (320 x 240) 262K color external display with contextual touch interaction • 2.2" QVGA (320 x 240) internal display, 262K color
Integrated 2.0 megapixel camera with 8x zoom
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola 2GB razr2 V8 gold Luxury QUAD band UNLOCKED GSM cellphone razr2 V8
